description:
The stretchy Rider Shorts feature a built-in brief for support and comfort throughout all your active pursuits. Lots of pockets for all your essentials, an elastic waistband and reflective details keep you going the extra mile.

  • Lightweight and stretchy polyester blend gives you fast drying comfort for every PB
  • Built-in polyester and spandex brief liner wicks moisture and provides chafe-free comfort, while the anti-bacterial treatment keeps things fresh
  • 2 side mesh pockets offer plenty of space for gels, while the inner thigh pocket keeps your essentials close
  • Built-in elasticated waist band gives you a customized fit
  • Reflective logos keep you bright when the lights get low
name: La Sportiva Rider Shorts - Men's
